skillTree.localised_description: Regular consumption of rotten meat and toxins are the staples of a healthy Ogre diet.
The reeking odour seeping from this one's every pore would offend any creature with a nose, and several without.
Stumpy and short-witted as they are, these Gnoblars have an eye on the sky at all times.
It never hurts to keep your lucky Gnoblar with you, just in case.
Puny magicks are nothing in the face of the Great Maw's endless hunger.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Those caught in the web of Braugh's chains find their spirits twisted and captured, bound to his befouling purpose, and forced into combat wailing and screaming.

ui_effects.localised_text: Summons a unit of Enslaved Spirits

skillTree.localised_description: Whenever a unit dies in Braugh's presence, some of its energy is leeched away by the necrotic Ogre via his foul, unearthly chains.

ui_effects.localised_text: Activates when an enemy unit is destroyed within 30 metres

skillTree.localised_description: Wreathed in the evil power of Dhar, Braugh's mere prescence - and the threat of eternal enslavement it poses - is enough to make his enemies cower in fear.

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

skillTree.localised_description: Soemtimes, a particular slave-to-be catches Braugh's eye. The poor bugger will wish that had never happened.
The necromantic chains that bind Braugh to his victims clamp into their very souls, allowing him to draw from their energy and preserve his own.
Braugh forces the unruliest of spirits into a state of explosive deconstruction, casting them into the fray as they rip themselves asunder in dangerous bursts.
Dying in Braugh's presence offers no release, but is merely another way to be captured and tortured - to be transformed into a battery of magical energy under his hateful eye.

ui_effects.localised_text: Summons a unit of Auroral Eidolons
Activates when an enemy unit is destroyed within 30 metres

skillTree.localised_description: Both the bodies and souls of those slain by Braugh are tied to him by his unholy chains, entrapped and forced to serve his foul being.

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

ui_effects.localised_text: Summons a unit of Enraged Corpses

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
Whether it be training harder, travelling lighter, eating less or sleeping better, there's always a way to draw more from the day.

effects.description: Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 5%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 10%
Increase Mobility action: Movement range is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: All will listen, for the news will either be dire or wonderful.

effects.description: Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 10
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 20
Stimulate Growth action: Growth is modified by an additional 30

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Braugh Slavelord deals not only in flesh but in spirits, trading the services of the quick and the dead to whoever pays the right price, an army of unquiet ghosts and walking corpses shambling meekly in his wake.

effects.description:
Meat gained from battles: +20%
	(all units in army)
